SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reportviews

Class TransactionsMarginOpenUnits

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reportviews.TransactionsMarginOpenUnits
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<TransactionsMarginOpenUnits>
public class TransactionsMarginOpenUnits extends Object implements Comparable<TransactionsMarginOpenUnits>
Represents an individual open margin transaction with its associated close transactions for sophisticated margin position tracking. Maintains the relationship between opening and closing trades for accurate gain/loss calculation in trading scenarios involving partial position closures and variable leverage. This class handles the intricate calculations required for margin trading where positions can be opened and closed in multiple transactions, each with potentially different prices, costs, and leverage factors. It maintains the necessary state to accurately attribute gains and losses to specific opening transactions when positions are closed partially or completely.

  • Field Details

    • openTransaction

      public Transaction openTransaction
      Original transaction that opened this margin position

    • openUnits

      public double openUnits
      Remaining open units after partial closures

    • realUntisCounter

      public double realUntisCounter
      Counter for real units adjusted for corporate actions and position changes. Maintains accurate unit tracking across stock splits events that affect the quantity of securities in the open position.

    • openPartPrice

      public double openPartPrice
      Price per unit for the open portion of the position, always zero or positive. Represents the effective entry price for this specific open position component, used as the reference point for gain/loss calculations when the position is closed.

    • expenseIncome

      public double expenseIncome
      Total expenses and income associated with opening this margin position. Includes transaction costs, fees, and any income received, forming part of the adjusted cost basis for accurate performance measurement.

    • markForRemove

      public boolean markForRemove
      Flag indicating whether this open position should be removed from tracking. Set to true when the position has been fully closed and all associated calculations have been completed for final cleanup operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionsMarginOpenUnits

      public TransactionsMarginOpenUnits(Transaction openTransaction, double openUnits, double expenseIncome, double splitFactorFromBaseTransaction)
      Creates a new open margin position tracker for sophisticated position management. Initializes all necessary parameters for accurate gain/loss calculation across the life of the margin position, including corporate action adjustments and directional position handling.
      Parameters:
      openTransaction - the transaction that opened this margin position
      openUnits - number of units in the opening position
      expenseIncome - total expenses and income for the opening transaction
      splitFactorFromBaseTransaction - split factor for corporate action consistency

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(TransactionsMarginOpenUnits transactionsMarginOpenUnits1)
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<TransactionsMarginOpenUnits>

    • calcGainLossOnPositionClose

      public double calcGainLossOnPositionClose(double price, double transactionCost)
      Calculates gain/loss for closing this entire open position at the specified price. Convenience method that closes the full remaining open position using the current split factor context and zero transaction costs for mark-to-market calculations.
      Parameters:
      price - closing price for gain/loss calculation
      transactionCost - transaction costs for the closing (currently not implemented)
      Returns:
      gain or loss from closing the position at the specified price

    • calcGainLossOnClosePosition

      public double calcGainLossOnClosePosition(double price, double transactionCost, double unitsSplited, double splitFactorToOpen)
      Calculates gain or loss for closing a specified quantity of this open position. Performs sophisticated calculations that account for corporate actions, leverage factors, and partial position closures to provide accurate performance attribution for margin trading scenarios.
      Parameters:
      price - closing price for the position portion
      transactionCost - transaction costs associated with the closure
      unitsSplited - number of units being closed (split-adjusted)
      splitFactorToOpen - split factor from current date back to opening
      Returns:
      gain or loss from closing the specified position portion
